message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll be interested in. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within a budget. Would you consider selling it for $100?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. However, I've got a lot invested in this product, so I can do a bit better than $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $125.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. Given my budget constraints, would you be willing to sell the product for $110?
I'm still a bit above my minimum price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $130, but that's as low as I can go.
